> Hi
	>
In our current project we are planning to use junit for unit testing of EJB
Components. We know the procedure of testing the EJB Components  in J2EE
Server using Junit framework. But we are not sure that whether we can use
junit testing framework in weblogic5.1 Application Server where in actually
we are deploying our beans.

I will be very grateful to you if you can mail us how to do unit testing
using Junit in Weblogic Server. Can you mail us information about where we
can get find this stuff on the net?
	           >
	           >          Thanking you ,
	           >
	           > Regards,
	           >
	           > Lakshmana Kumar PVNK
